summary: An email from a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center requesting records and contact information regarding Jeffrey Epstein's prior incarceration in Florida, in relation to investigations into his death the previous weekend.

persons.name: Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC
persons.context: The author of the email, requesting records and contact information regarding Jeffrey Epstein's prior incarceration in Florida from the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Epstein's Death in Custody
events.description: The incident referenced as occurring 'this past weekend' is the death of Jeffrey Epstein while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Request for Prior Incarceration Records
events.description: A Supervisory Staff Attorney emails to request records and contact information for Epstein's prior incarceration facility and the U.S. Attorney's Office in Florida.

locations: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email is dated August 13, 2019, days after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
The sender is a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center where Epstein died.
The email seeks records and contacts related to Epstein's prior incarceration in Florida, indicating an investigation into the circumstances of his death.
The request is made in relation to 'the various investigations into the incident this past weekend,' confirming multiple probes were launched immediately after Epstein's death.
